about_the_game:
Enter the heart-pounding world of Pitch Race, where the thrill of 3D multiplayer car racing meets musical prowess. This innovative game seamlessly incorporates a musical instrument as the primary controller, transforming every note played into fuel for victory. As players master their chosen instrument, they propel their cars across interconnected networks, with the intensity of their music dictating the speed of their journey.

In this exhilarating adventure, each level offers unique challenges:

  • Level 1 and beyond introduce separate notes for turning left/right and driving, requiring precision and skill to navigate the twists and turns of the track.
  • Level 2 and beyond raise the stakes by dynamically changing the notes for turning and driving throughout the game, keeping players on their toes and their fingers agile.
Pitch Race isn't just a game it's the ultimate long tone workout for musicians, blending adrenaline-pumping action with the discipline of musical mastery. Are you ready to rev up your engine and hit all the right notes on the road to victory?

  • Level 2 and beyond raise the stakes by dynamically changing the notes for turning and driving throughout the game, keeping players on their toes and their fingers agile.
Pitch Race isn't just a game it's the ultimate long tone workout for musicians, blending adrenaline-pumping action with the discipline of musical mastery. Are you ready to rev up your engine and hit all the right notes on the road to victory?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Pitch Race Car Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An immersive 3D car racing experience that integrates playing musical notes on an instrument as the primary controller for the game.
